channel.title: trial 1 on Danganronpa MK2
channel.description: Recent content in trial 1 on Danganronpa MK2

item.title: Command: Skip
item.description: CHAPTER 01 YAHOOOOOOOO!!! EXTREEEEEEEEEEEEME! CHAPTER 01 Kyaaaah! CHAPTER 01 Phew! I feel bad for anyone who missed out on that spectacle! CHAPTER 01 T-Teruteru! CHAPTER 01 Gh... oooohhhh...! A-Are you... fucking serious... ughhh...! CHAPTER 01 Ah.

item.title: Trial 1 - Part 14
item.description: CHAPTER 01 Geh-hehe... it looks like your argument has come to a close. Oops! I lost control of my wild side for a second. Was that a side effect of the meat I just ate? ...Well, putting that aside, let's move along to the nerve-wracking voting time! Please pull the lever in front of you and cast your vote. CHAPTER 01 Ughhhh.

item.title: Trial 1 - Part 13
item.description: CASE 01 THIS IS THE TRUTH! CASE 01 You hid the skewer inside that meat on the bone, didn’t you!? CASE 01 Wha-Wha-Wha-Wha-Wha-Wha-Wha-Wha-Wha-Wha-Wha-Wha-Wha!? CASE 01 What are you sayin'...? Dere's no way I'd hide anything... in a place like that.

item.title: Trial 1 - Part 12
item.description: CASE 01 What're y'all even sayin' anymore!? I'm tellin' ya I was in dat dere dinin' hall durin' da blackou'! CASE 01 ...Where are you from again? CASE 01 Oooh I was born 'n West Azabu and raised 'n South Aoyama! CASE 01 Hey, you guys!

item.title: Trial 1 - Part 11
item.description: CASE 01 I don’t want to accuse anyone... Not again... CASE 01 But... I have no choice. CASE 01 The killer used the fire doors to block off the corridor, and moved through the darkness using my camera... CASE 01 Then they snuck into the crawlspace, used the glow-in-the-dark paint as a landmark.

item.title: Trial 1 - Part 10
item.description: CASE 01 During the party, the killer... CASE 01 ...waslurking under the floor like a cockroach. CASE 01 They could've stared at panties all day... CASE 01 ...without going to the storage room in the dark! CASE 01 Is that true, Fuyuhiko!

item.title: Trial 1 - Part 9
item.description: CASE 01 Well, what now? CASE 01 If the knife isn't the murder weapon, there's no definitive proof that I'm the killer. CASE 01 Then what the hell was all that before...? CASE 01 Y-You say you were shoved away, but...you can't actually prove it, right?

item.title: Trial 1 - Intermission
item.description: CASE 01 Phew... It’s taken a long time to get here, hasn’t it? Did you need a moment to clear your head? You could put it that way. Phuhu... It seems hunger makes you do crazy things, ‘cause that fruit nearly blindsided me! Hueh? Can you imagine? Abandoning this killing game... leaving its students to enjoy their holiday in peace.

item.title: Trial 1 - Part 8
item.description: CASE 01 I-I think it's strange that... CASE 01 The killer is so obviously Nagito! CASE 01 U-Um... CASE 01 He has already confessed... CASE 01 Um... You know... CASE 01 That bastard Nagito is the one who did it!

item.title: Trial 1 - Part 7
item.description: CASE 01 Let’s cut to the chase... You’re correct! It was my doing all along! CASE 01 I’m the one who hid the knife under the table before the party started. CASE 01 I’m the one who used the power cord to find my way to the table in the dark.

item.title: Trial 1 - Part 6
item.description: CASE 01 A clue, you say? CASE 01 Do you know who the killer is? CASE 01 I have an inkling, yeah... but I wanna know what you guys think. CASE 01 Then tell us. What is this damning clue? CASE 01 I want to talk about how the killer got to the knife during the blackout.

item.title: Trial 1 - Part 5
item.description: CASE 01 If the irons in the storage room caused the blackout... CASE 01 Then for the killer to turn the irons on... CASE 01 You're saying they went all the way to the storage room? CASE 01 Then that means everyone who was in the dining hall.

item.title: Trial 1 - Part 4
item.description: CASE 01 Everyone except Peko was in the hall after the party started, right? CASE 01 I see... So there's no way anybody else could've locked themselves in the bathroom except Peko. CASE 01 I-I guess that would be... true... CASE 01 Y-You locked yourself in the commode?

item.title: Trial 1 - Part 3
item.description: CASE 01 Be careful! The first kill will happen tonight. Someone will definitely kill someone. CASE 01 Hey... The hell is this...? CASE 01 Mahiru and I found this in Byakuya's cottage. CASE 01 It... appears to be a threat someone sent to Byakuya. CASE 01 So who's this someone?

item.title: Trial 1 - Part 2
item.description: CASE 01 I'm sure Byakuya ducked under the table... CASE 01 ...during the blackout. CASE 01 That sounds correct! CASE 01 If that's the case... CASE 01 During the blackout, Mr. Ham Hands... CASE 01 .

item.title: Trial 1 - Part 1
item.description: CASE 01 Now then, let's begin with a simple explanation of the class trial. CASE 01 During the class trial, you will present your arguments for who the killer is, and vote for "whodunnit." If you vote correctly, then only the blackened will receive punishment. But if you pick the wrong person... CASE 01 I'll punish everyone *besides* the blackened, and that person will earn the right to leave this island!
